Description: Job Description:Job ResponsibilitiesThe Corporate Affairs Director for Mars Pet Nutrition India will be responsible for leading the Corporate Affairs & Corporate Communication function supporting the business and is a key member of the Mars Pet Nutrition India Leadership teamThe functional priorities include to raise the reputation of Mars in India across both Mars Pet Nutrition India and through the One Mars reputation council. At the same time, the CA Director will need to deliver quality growth by navigating the dynamics of the Indian political and regulatory framework through public affairs and advocacy strategies. These include navigating critical challenges in the areas of sustainability (including plastic waste, health and well being, deforestation and human rights), ingredient safety, labour, trade, manufacturing and state legislation/regulation. This role will include leading issues and crisis management for Mars Pet Nutrition India, including managing media and government stakeholders. In addition, the role will lead internal communications, which is a critical enabler for engaging the Associate population.
